verses.text: Give \w ear|strong="H0238"\w*, O \w Shepherd|strong="H7462"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, thou that \w leadest|strong="H5090"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* like a \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*; thou that \w dwellest|strong="H3427"\w* \add between\add* the \w cherubims|strong="H3742"\w*, shine \w forth|strong="H3313"\w*.\f + \fr 80.1 \ft of: or, for\f*

\w Before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* and \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* and \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* stir \w up|strong="H5782"\w* thy \w strength|strong="H1369"\w*, and \w come|strong="H3212"\w* \add and\add* \w save|strong="H3444"\w* us.\f + \fr 80.2 \ft come…: Heb. come for salvation to us\f*
Turn us \w again|strong="H7725"\w*, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and cause thy \w face|strong="H6440"\w* to \w shine|strong="H0215"\w*; and we shall be \w saved|strong="H3467"\w*.

O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, how long wilt thou be \w angry|strong="H6225"\w* against the \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w* of thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w*?\f + \fr 80.4 \ft be…: Heb. smoke\f*

Thou \w feedest|strong="H0398"\w* them with the \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* of \w tears|strong="H1832"\w*; and givest them \w tears|strong="H1832"\w* to \w drink|strong="H8248"\w* in great \w measure|strong="H7991"\w*.
Thou \w makest|strong="H7760"\w* us a \w strife|strong="H4066"\w* unto our \w neighbours|strong="H7934"\w*: and our \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* \w laugh|strong="H3932"\w* among themselves.

Turn us \w again|strong="H7725"\w*, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, and cause thy \w face|strong="H6440"\w* to \w shine|strong="H0215"\w*; and we shall be \w saved|strong="H3467"\w*.

Thou hast \w brought|strong="H5265"\w* a \w vine|strong="H1612"\w* out of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*: thou hast cast \w out|strong="H1644"\w* the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*, and \w planted|strong="H5193"\w* it.

Thou \w preparedst|strong="H6437"\w* \add room\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* it, and didst cause it to take \w deep|strong="H8328"\w* \w root|strong="H8327"\w*, and it \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

The \w hills|strong="H2022"\w* were \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* with the \w shadow|strong="H6738"\w* of it, and the \w boughs|strong="H6057"\w* thereof \add were like\add* the \w goodly|strong="H0410"\w* \w cedars|strong="H0730"\w*.\f + \fr 80.10 \ft goodly…: Heb. cedars of God\f*
She sent \w out|strong="H7971"\w* her \w boughs|strong="H7105"\w* unto the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, and her \w branches|strong="H3127"\w* unto the \w river|strong="H5104"\w*.

Why hast thou \add then\add* broken \w down|strong="H6555"\w* her \w hedges|strong="H1447"\w*, so that all they which \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* by the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* do \w pluck|strong="H0717"\w* her?

The \w boar|strong="H2386"\w* out of the \w wood|strong="H3293"\w* doth \w waste|strong="H3765"\w* it, and the wild \w beast|strong="H2123"\w* of the \w field|strong="H7704"\w* doth \w devour|strong="H7462"\w* it.

\w Return|strong="H7725"\w*, we beseech thee, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*: look \w down|strong="H5027"\w* from \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, and \w behold|strong="H7200"\w*, and \w visit|strong="H6485"\w* this \w vine|strong="H1612"\w*;

And the \w vineyard|strong="H3657"\w* which thy right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* hath \w planted|strong="H5193"\w*, and the \w branch|strong="H1121"\w* \add that\add* thou madest \w strong|strong="H0553"\w* for thyself.

\add It is\add* \w burned|strong="H8313"\w* with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, \add it is\add* cut \w down|strong="H3683"\w*: they \w perish|strong="H0006"\w* at the \w rebuke|strong="H1606"\w* of thy \w countenance|strong="H6440"\w*.

Let thy \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* be upon the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of thy right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w*, upon the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \add whom\add* thou madest \w strong|strong="H0553"\w* for thyself.
So will not we go \w back|strong="H5472"\w* from thee: \w quicken|strong="H2421"\w* us, and we will \w call|strong="H7121"\w* upon thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.

Turn us \w again|strong="H7725"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, cause thy \w face|strong="H6440"\w* to \w shine|strong="H0215"\w*; and we shall be \w saved|strong="H3467"\w*.
